loans.name: Sieng

texts.en:
Sieng, 47, is married and lives in a peaceful village in Baray district, Kompong Tom province. She owns a store and sells merchandise including groceries such as canned foods, snacks, biscuits, soft drinks and other types of household products out of her house. From this business, she is able to earn USD 2.00 per day to support her family, while another main source of income is from her spouse who runs a pig fattening project and distils Khmer traditional white wine.

Sieng is requesting credit to purchase 16 piglets and 10 sacks of feed to make a stable business for the family.  This will be her third loan from HKL. She has paid off the previous two loans already. In the future,  Sieng wants to have a medium-sized farm for raising and breeding pigs.

loans.use: to purchase 16 piglets and 10 sacks of feed to make a stable business for the family.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy leather, cloth and embroidery material for glove-making business

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 46 years old, married to Alice, and blessed with two children. He operates a hardware shop in Nyahururu town. He plans to use this loan amount to buy more stock of hardware items like nails, paint, iron sheets and pipes for sale. 

In the future, Peter hopes to expand his business and open other hardware shops in Nyahururu.

loans.use: To buy more stock  of nails, paint, iron sheets and pipes for sale.

loans.name: Pech

texts.en:
Pech is 51 years old and is responsible for five children, four of whom are employed in various jobs in Phnom Penh city. Each month they always share part of their incomes to help the family. Pech’s main business activities focus on agriculture, including crops and livestock husbandry. Most work at the rice field is managed as well by him. Therefore, Pech can take time to raise livestock at home. 

Due to the lack a family-owned family, Pech’s family is experiencing difficulties in living. To deal with the problem, Pech now would like to have these funds to purchase a motorcycle for home use. In future, Pech anticipates renovating his house because it’s a bit old and is in need of repair.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for home use.

loans.name: Armen

texts.en:
Armen is 31 years old. He lives in Verishen village with his wife. Four years ago, Armen got involved in the agricultural business. Armen runs a farm, where he is raising three cows and five pigs. 

Armen has applied for this loan to develop pig breeding. With the requested loan he plans to purchase 16 pigs and barley and wheat to feed them. 

Development of pig breeding will allow Armen to  increase his income from agriculture, which is vital for him to insure a prosperous future for his family in the future.

loans.use: to pay for pigs, barley and wheat

loans.name: Rehana's Group

texts.en:
Rehana has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will buy a new sewing machine because her current machine doesn’t produce quality work and takes much time to sew a single dress. By purchasing a new sewing machine she will be able to finish the orders on time and it will help her make more profits. 

Her husband does a job for a low income which is not enough for the whole family. That’s why Rehana started her business a few years ago to support her husband financially. She has given birth to 2 daughters and a son. All of them are enrolled in local school and getting their education. Rehana also performs her household duties very well along with her business and her family is very happy with her efforts. 

She is confident about her business success as a result of a loan investment.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for sewing business

loans.name: Armen

texts.en: Armen is 52 years old. He lives in Verishen village with his 49-year-old wife and 80-year-old mother. Armen's children are married and live apart. The family is involved in cattle breeding. The main income comes from selling received milk and meat. Armen would like to increase his income by selling more milk and meat. To implement this goal, he plans to purchase two more cows. Armen will also use the loan amount to purchase grass to feed the cattle. With increased income, Armen will not only improve his household conditions, but also support his children's young families.

loans.use: to pay for cows and grass

loans.name: Run

texts.en:
Run is 31 years old, a married woman who has been residing in Ang Snoul district of Kandal province. She acts as a seamstress from her own house and provides sewing services to local people. From this business, she is able to generate an average income of 5 USD each day. She has a common law relationship with her spouse who works for a private company in Phnom Penh city. They are blessed with a child who is still attending school.

At the present, Run is asking for a loan of 500 USD from HKL to purchase a used motorcycle for her husband commuting to work daily. This loan will allow Run to solve the financial difficulties and upgrade her living condition.

loans.use: to purchase a used motorcycle for her husband commuting to work daily.

loans.name: Keo

texts.en:
From Kompong Speu province, where Keo, 57, lives with her husband and three children, she cultivates the land for her livelihood. Rice is the main focus of the family. Keo has been engaged in the business for more than 30 years. She learned all the methods and followed the path of her ancestors in the way she lives and works.

She is taking out a loan from Kiva, through HKL, to buy construction supplies, which she will use to repair her present house. In the coming years, she wants to expand her farm and further establish the business.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies.

loans.name: Pring

texts.en:
This family's main business is to cultivate rice, from which Pring can earn a suitable income annually to satisfy the family’s needs in a sufficient way. Pring is 48 years old and has been in the business for ages. Most of the time she works alongside her husband who is in the same type of business. Together, they have been blessed with 2 children, who live independently.

Pring would like to acquire a loan through HKL to purchase additional floorboards and columns to get the unfinished parts of the construction done. She hopes to have a comfortable house for living. She is thankful for the support and she commits to pay her loan back on time by the set schedule as it is now her second loan from our firm.

loans.use: to purchase additional floorboards and columns to get the unfinished parts of the construction done.

loans.name: Annah

texts.en:
Annah is 48 years old, widowed, and supports one person in her family. She sells new shoes and second-hand clothes, a business she ventured into eight years ago and she earns a monthly income of KES 15,000. 

She has requested a loan of KES 30,000 to purchase more new shoes and bales of jackets and trousers for sale. 

The profit she earns from this business will help her repay her loan. Her dream is to expand her business and move to a bigger shop, and this is her first loan.

loans.use: To buy more new shoes and bales of jackets and trousers for sale.

loans.name: Artak

texts.en:
Artak is 25 years old. He lives in Hatsavan village with his parents. The main source of income for the family is agriculture: cattle breeding and land cultivation. The family has been running the farm for nine years. 

Artak needs some financial investments to start and complete the land cultivation. With the requested amount he plans to purchase fertilizer and fuel for agricultural machines. He also plans to renovate the machines and organize  the land cultivation process more effectively. 

This loan will help Artak to maintain the growth of the farm and have a stable source of income, which is important for him to create  improved living conditions for his future family.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer, fuel and renovation of agricultural techniques.

loans.name: Munaza's Group

texts.en:
Munaza has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her sewing business. She is very skilful and has a lot of enthusiasm for her work. She can sew designer and non-designer dresses. She didn’t get any training in sewing but due to her interest and creativity she sews well and is praised by her customers. 

With the loan investment, she will buy a new sewing machine because her current machine has become old which is affecting on her work. 

By purchasing a new sewing machine she will be able to complete orders on time and increase her profits.  She is very experienced in her business and confident about her business success after investing the loan into it.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for sewing business

loans.name: Huon

texts.en:
Huon resides with her husband and four single children in Baray district, Kompong Tom. Most of her children are students attending local public schools. Huon earns a living by cultivating rice both seasons of the year. She is now 31 years old and she has been in the business since 2008.

For additional income, Huon would like to ask for some funds from Kiva partner, HKL, to purchase piglets for fattening and a sow for breeding purposes. She hopes she will be able to make a good income from the investment.

loans.use: to purchase piglets for fattening and a sow for breeding purposes.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah has been in the cereals business in Nakuru town for the last 12 years. She is a 35-year-old single lady.

Sarah was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers during a marketing awareness done in her area. This will be her first loan from KADET LTD. She plans to use the loan amount to buy more cereals like green grams (mung beans) and maize to sell in her business.

In the future, Sarah hopes to expand her business and supply cereals to other parts of Nakuru.

loans.use: To buy cereals like green grams and maize for resale

loans.name: Felton

texts.en:
Felton is a 46-year-old butchery owner in Mikindani, Mombasa. He is married and a father of five school-going children. His business has been in operation for the past 14 years. The business is doing great.

This marks his first business loan from KADET LTD to finance his business. He plans to use the loan to renovate his butchery. 

He will use the anticipated profits to educate his children and expand his business further. He hopes to have a bigger, more profitable business in the future.

loans.use: to renovate his butchery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase crates of soda, bottles of mineral water, sweets, and biscuits for sale.

loans.name: Rica

texts.en:
Rica operates a small store in which she offers different kinds of basic commodities. She just started this business last year; previously, she had devoted her time to running her hog-raising business. Rica is a young entrepreneur and married woman. She lives with her whole family in the village of Rizaluna, Cordon. Her place is far from the market and relies more on agricultural business.

Since Rica has just started her small store, she would like to buy more groceries that are needed in her village. But due to insufficient funds, Rica is motivated to borrow additional capital from lenders in the amount of 10,000 Philippine pesos. She hopes to obtain the requested loan amount in order to increase her profits, which will serve her children's education and improve their living condition.

loans.use: to buy more groceries which are needed in her village

loans.name: Khitam

texts.en:
Khitam is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Tayseer appears in her Kiva profile photo, with the picture next to his taxi.

Khitam is a 44-year-old woman, a mother with two daughters. For the past 10 years, Khitam's husband has been driving a taxi, which has been a profitable project and the only source of income for the family.

Khitam is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing new engine for the taxi he drives. This will increase the taxi's capacity to work extra hours and enable Khitam's husband to take additional requests for trips in and out of town,  which will improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase a new engine for the taxi

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 37 years old, married, and blessed with four children aged 13, 11, 7 and 5 years. She runs a grocery business that she started three years ago and earns a monthly income of 7,000 KES.

She wants to purchase more fruits, vegetables, raw maize, and beans for sale. Her profit will be reinvested in her business. This is her first loan, and she hopes to be successful in her business.

loans.use: to purchase fruits, vegetables, raw maize, and beans for sale.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 28 years old and married. He and his wife Peninah have one child. He has operated an electronics shop in Naivasha for the last two years. He plans to use this loan to buy more stock of electronics for sale and thereby meet his clients’ needs and demands as well as be able to increase his income. 

In the future, Stephen hopes to invest more in his business and get more income so that he can buy a plot of land and build both residential and commercial houses.

loans.use: To buy more stock of electronic items for sale

loans.name: Mout

texts.en:
Mout is 40 years old. She lives in the Pouk district with her family: her husband and five single children. Mout has run an agriculture business since 2005. She farms rice and raises piglets for sale.

Now Mout would like to earn more income by developing her pig-breeding business. For this reason, she has applied for this loan to purchase pigs and feed. She is very excited about the loan and is thankful to the lenders.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and forage to feed them.

loans.name: Maurice

texts.en:
Maurice is 29 years old, and he and his wife Rhoda have three children. He operates a barbershop and has been in this business for the past two years.

This is his first loan from KADET LTD. He was introduced to KADET LTD by a staff member. He will use the loan to purchase two chairs for use in his business and also purchase socks and caps for sale to his barbershop customers.

Maurice hopes to expand and open a salon to increase his income.

loans.use: to buy two chairs for use in his business and  socks and caps for sale to the men he shaves.

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es:
Luis Miguel tiene 23 años de edad, vive en unión libre y tiene un hijo de 2 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de San Pedro Sula, Cortes.
Luis Miguel hace 7 años estableció un Taller donde ofrece los servicios de Enderezado y pintura de vehículo. El ejerce esta actividad porque desde muy pequeño su padre le enseño y se motivo a tener su propio negocio. En el cual manifiesta le va muy bien porque cuenta con sus propios clientes, obteniendo un buen capital de trabajo ya que sus ingresos han mejorado dándole una mejor calidad de vida  a su familia. El trabaja en su taller 8 horas diarias.
El solicita un préstamo a ODEF por la cantidad de 25,000 lempiras para hacerle mejoras a su negocio como construir un anexo al taller. Para dar una mejor comodidad de servicio a sus clientes. 
Con esta inversión el piensa aumentar la demanda de clientes y satisfacer las necesidades que demanden, y por consiguiente satisfacer también las necesidades de sus familia.
texts.en:
Luis Miguel, age 23, is in a common-law marriage, and he has a two year old child.  He lives in the city of San Pedro Sula, Cortes.

Seven years ago Luis Miguel established a shop where he does bodywork and paints vehicles.  He exercises this business activity because his father taught him when he was very young.  He was motivated to have his own business.

He states that it is going very well for him because he has his own customers, and he is getting good working capital.  His income has improved, thereby giving his family a better quality of life.  He works in his shop eight hours a day.

He is requesting a loan from ODEF for the amount of 25,000 lempiras.  The loan is to make improvements to his business like building an annex to his shop.  This would be to make his service more convenient for his customers.

With this investment he plans to increase customer demand and to meet his customers’ needs.  He will therefore also satisfy his family’s needs.

loans.use: to improve his place of work (an annex).

loans.name: So

texts.en:
So is 30 years old. She is from the Baray district in the Kompong Tom province. She is married and has a young child. She commonly works in agriculture, especially rice and pig husbandry. So started raising pigs in 1988 and has since become independent. She sells her pigs to local butchers after 3-5 months of raising.

So is requesting this loan to buy additional pigs to raise. The loan will help her business grow by helping her raise her animals better and maintain them in better conditions for their development. Her future plan is to help her family out of poverty and provide her only child with a good education.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Abdurauf

texts.ru: Абдурауф парень 28 лет, женат имеет троих детей. Сам занимается дехканским хозяйством по выращиванию и продажи арахиса, а также откормом и продажей скота.Он в основном покупает баранов и коз.Потому что хорошо разбирается в породах скота. Абдурауф узнав от своих друзей про кредиты, тоже решил в кредит увеличить свой бизнес животноводства и купить несколько голов молодых коз.Его место проживания расположено около гор, поэтому скот пасётся целыми днями в горах, а вечером их пригоняет пастух по домам.
texts.en: Abdurauf is a 28 year-old young man, who is married and has three children.  He is involved in dekhan farming of growing and selling peanuts and also in fattening up and selling livestock.  He primarily buys sheep and goats.  Being knowledgeable in livestock breeds and having learnt from his friends about loans, Abdurauf also decided to obtain a loan and expand his animal husbandry business by buying a few heads of young goats.  His residence is located near mountains, and this is why livestock spends entire days at a pasture in the mountains, and a shepherd brings them back in the evenings.

loans.use: to buy a few goats

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana, de 31 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa con muchos deseos de superación.  Está separada del padre de sus 2 hijas Diana de 14 y Nayeli de 8 años de edad.  Vive en su casa propia en compañía de sus hijas a las que quiere mucho y son su estimulo para seguir esforzándose. La actividad que realiza Juana es la venta de abarrotes  de primera necesidad los cuales compra en los centros comerciales de la ciudad y los vende desde su propia casa a pedido, no tiene una bodega pero vende sus productos a sus vecinos a crédito cobrando diariamente. 
Lleva dedicándose a éste negocio  hace más de 3 años, tiempo que viene atendiendo de manera amable y cordial a sus clientes ganándose su preferencia.
Considera su negocio bastante rentable por  las ganancias que le deja en la venta al crédito, donde sube considerablemente sus precios.
Le gusta su negocio pues le permite estar en casa y cerca de sus hijas y así poder atenderlas, además de brindarle un oficio, mantenerla ocupada y generarle un ingreso económico para poder apoyarse con  los gastos de su hogar y la educación de sus hijas. Por tanto, viendo los buenos resultados que está teniendo con su negocio tiene planes de continuar  e incluso hacerlo crecer, adquiriendo más mercaderías para surtir y tener mayor variedad para ofertar. Este será el  préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP, se siente contenta con la oportunidad de contar con una línea de crédito, por eso se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, para tener un buen record crediticio y tener acceso a más créditos en el futuro. Por otro lado comenta sentirse a gusto con su grupo solidario pues conoce a sus integrantes y los considera ser buenas personas.
Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería para surtir su negocio, como abarrotes de primera necesidad a precio por mayor para así tener mayores márgenes de ganancias. También comprará uniformes escolares para venderlos entre sus vecinas.
texts.en:
Juana, 31 years old, is a hard-working and enterprising woman with much desire to get ahead. She is separated from the father of her 2 daughters, Diana (aged 14) and Nayeli (aged 8). Jauna lives in her own house with her children whom she loves very much; they are her stimulus for continuing ahead. Juana's activity is selling groceries of primary necessity, which she buys in the city's commercial centers and sells by order from her own house. She doesn't have a store but, rather, sells her products to neighbors on credit, collecting daily.

Juana has had this business for over 3 years, during which she has tended her customers in a kind and cordial manner, earning their loyalty. She considers her earnings sufficient to allow her to sell on credit, but to do so, she has to raise prices considerably.

Juana likes her business since it allows her to be at home to attend to her daughters, plus it offers a job, keeps her occupied and generates income to help cover household expenses and the education of her daughters. Consequently, seeing the good results from her business, she plans to continue, making it grow, acquiring more merchandise to re-stock, and offering more variety.

This will be Juana's 4th loan through MFP. She feels content with the opportunity of a new line of credit, and she promises to comply with the payment schedule, to keep her good credit record and to have access to future loans. Juana comments, in addition, that she feels good among her support group, since she knows the members and considers them to be good people.

With this 2,000 new sols, Juana will purchase merchandise to re-supply her store, buying groceries of primary necessity at wholesale prices in order to have a larger profit margin. Also, she will buy school uniforms to sell among her neighbors.

loans.use: buy products to supply her business, and school uniforms to sell to neighbors.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur is 30 years old, and he lives in Kapan town in the south of Armenia. Artur's family consists of six people: Artur, his wife, his parents, and two little children. He is involved in an auto repair business. He is also involved in agriculture and has been keeping  beehives for 5 years. Now Artur has 25 beehives. 

Artur has applied for this loan to increase his number of beehives. This will allow him to produce and sell more honey and increase his income, which will allow him to cover the rising costs of providing for his family.

loans.use: to pay for beehives.

loans.name: Fayza

texts.en:
Fayza is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online. Her son appears in her Kiva profile photo, photographed in his cafe.

Fayza is a 47-year-old woman, and she is a widow and a mother with two sons. For the past year, Fayza's son has been operating a cafe, which has been a profitable project.

Fayza is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her son cover the costs of improving conditions in the cafe.  The loan will pay for painting and purchasing new serving kits, trays, and additional chairs and tables. This will improve the image of the cafe and increase the number of customers, which will help her son increase his income.

loans.use: to improve the conditions in her son's cafe.

loans.name: Doniyor

texts.ru: Дониёр молодой человек, женат имеет одного ребёнка. Работает наёмным водителем маршрутного городского такси. Его ежемесячный доход хватает только на семейные расходы семьи, поэтому он дополнительно имеет доход от откорма и продажи скота.Раньше он помогал своему отцу в данном деле, а теперь он сам самостоятельно занимается откормом. Дониёр хочет на полученный кредит купить  корову, а также корм. Сейчас у него одна корова и 10 баранов, для которых необходим корм. По сравнению с прошлым годом корм резко подорожал на рынке, поэтому сельскому населению не по карману закуп корма оптом мешками.
texts.en: Doniyor is a young man, who is married and has one child.  He works as a for-hire driver of a municipal shuttle taxi.  His monthly income is enough only to cover the family's expenses, and this is why he has an additional income from fattening up and selling livestock.  Previously, he used to help his father in this business and is now involved in fattening up livestock independently.  Doniyor wants to use this loan to buy a cow and livestock feed.  Currently, he has one cow and ten sheep, who need livestock feed.  Compared to last year, livestock feed became drastically expensive at the market, and this is why rural residents cannot afford to buy feed by bags wholesale.

loans.use: to buy a cow and livestock feed

loans.name: Vigen

texts.en:
Vigen is 36 years old. He lives in the village of Akunk with his wife, parents, and two children. Vigen's parents are both pensioners, and his wife is a housewife. The main source of income for the family is agriculture.  For five years now, Vigen has been running a farm, where he breeds cows and calves. 

Vigen wants to move into other fields of livestock breeding, too, to make the farm more profitable. In particular, Vigen wants to purchase pigs and develop a pig breeding business. This will allow him to increase his income and insure economic stability for his family.

loans.use: to pay for pigs

loans.name: Damira

texts.ru:
Дамире 27 лет, замужем,  воспитывает двух детей, младшему из которых 10 месяцев. 
В начале 2010 года  Дамира со супругом купили дом селе Беловодское, и в поисках дохода для своей семьи, начали свой бизнес в животноводстве. Вложив в качестве стартового капитала сумму в 20,000 сом (KGS), Дамира смогла развить хозяйство с ежемесячной прибылью 6,000 сом (KGS). В настоящее время  в хозяйстве Дамиры  имеется 2бычка, и для расширения поголовья скота за счет покупки дойных коров, Дамира обратилась  в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS).  Доходы от кредита Дамира планирует вложить  в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Damira is 27 years old, married and raising two children, the youngest of whom is ten months old.  At the beginning of 2010, Damira and her husband bought a house in the Belovodskoe village and, in search of an income source for their family, started their own business in animal husbandry.  Having invested an initial capital of 20,000 som (KGS), Damira was able to grow her business to have a monthly profit of 6,000 som (KGS).  At the present time, her business contains two bulls and, to increase livestock headcount by buying dairy cows, Damira requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Suyumkan

texts.ru:
Суюмкан 55 лет, имеет одну дочь.  Суюмкан занимается перепродажей сельхозпродукции, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 3,000 сом (KGS).  Благодаря упорному труду Суюмкан, на сегодняшний день ее оборотные средства составляют около 40,000 сом (KGS)  и ежемесячная выручка  - около  7,000 сом.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Суюмкан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на увеличение товарооборота.  Доходы от кредита Суюмкан планирует вложить в оплату обучение для дочери, которая собирается поступать в университет в этом году.
texts.en: Suyumkan is 55 years old and has one daughter.  Suyumkan is involved in reselling agricultural crops, having started this business with an amount of 3,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her hard work, today her working capital amounts to about 40,000 som (KGS) and monthly profit is about 7,000 som.  In order to further develop her business, Suyumkan requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to increase goods turnover.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into paying for her daughter's education, who plans to attend a university this year.

loans.use: to broaden an assortment of goods

loans.name: Kosar's Group

texts.en:
Kosar has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her son’s fruit sales business. With the loan investment, he will buy fresh seasonal fruits for selling to his clients. This will help him to attract more clients and increase his sales and income. 

Kosar is also a working lady and supports her family by sewing clothes for neighborhood clients. She has good sewing skills and receives regular orders every month due to her good quality work. 

Kosar is the mother of five children. As mentioned earlier, her eldest son operates a fruit sales business. Her two other sons work with their father in his furniture polishing business, and both of her daughters support her in her sewing business. 

Kosar is very confident that her family’s hard work will pay off one day, and they will be able to better their financial situation in the near future.

loans.use: To buy fresh seasonal fruits for fruits sales business

loans.name: Garik

texts.en: Garik is 26 years old. He lives in Yeghegnadzor with his parents. Garik is a contract military man in the local military unit. In addition, Garik is involved in cattle breeding and raises two cows. Garik plans to increase his number of cows, for which he needs financing. With the help of this loan, Garik will purchase two more cows and cattle feed. Garik expects this loan will improve his income, which he plans to invest in further expansion of the farm.

loans.use: to pay for cows and cattle feed.

loans.name: Uruila

texts.ru: Уруйле 53 лет, вдова, воспитала 5 детей, живет с младшим сыном – школьником. Уруйла долгое время проработала преподавателем физики в местной школе. В 2010 году, в поисках дополнительного источника дохода для своей семьи,  Уруйла начала свой бизнес в торговле запасными частями на рынке. Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  Уруйла сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  в 20,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день ассортимент товаров не представлен в изобилии, и по этой причине Уруйла  обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 51,000 сом (KGS).  Доходы от кредита Уруйла планирует частично вложить в закуп стройматериалов для постройки магазина, и часть – в развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Uruila is a 53-year-old widow. She has raised 5 children and lives with her youngest school-age son. For a long time, Uruila worked as a physics teacher in the local school. In 2010, while looking for a source of additional income for her family, she launched her own business selling spare parts at the market. Thanks to Uruila's persistence and hard work, she was able to develop her business so that it now makes 20,000 som (KGS) per month. Presently, the assortment of goods in the shop is not very wide, and for this reason Uruila has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 51,000 som (KGS). She is planning to invest a part of her profits from this loan into purchasing building materials to construct a store, and another part into further development of her business.

loans.use: to broaden the assortment of goods in her shop

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz, de 30 años de edad, es una mujer alegre y con deseos de superación, también es amable y cordial.  Está casada con Gilder quien es obrero y padre de su único hijo Alex de 11 años de edad a quien desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida.  Vive en compañía de su esposo e hijo, instalados cómodamente en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Luz es la costura, oficio que aprendió estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional en otra ciudad, para luego comprar una maquina de coser con sus ahorros, y desde entonces instaló en su propia casa un taller donde atender a sus clientes, quienes la buscan por sus buenos acabados, logrando ganarse  su aceptación y así la recomiendan con otras personas que luego se vuelven en sus clientes habituales.  Se inicio hace más de 4 meses en éste negocio, realizándolo ella sola.
Considera rentable su actividad por las ganancias que le deja que son mayores a su anterior negocio de venta de verduras. Le gusta la costura por el oficio y ocupación que le brinda, que le valió para apoyar a su pareja a solventar los gastos de su hogar y la educación de su hijo, quienes son su mayor motivación para progresar. Pero comenta le incomoda un poco el cansancio físico por estar sentada en una misma postura que le ocasiona dolores de espalda, pero eso no la desanima y continua trabajando y esforzándose. Por tanto tiene  planes de ampliar su negocio y comprarse otras maquinas de coser para poder tener un mejor acabo en su costura. Este será el préstamo número 3 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida con la ayuda financiera que viene recibiendo y desea continuar con este apoyo, por tanto se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en créditos anteriores. Además comenta estar a gusto con su grupo solidario ya que  conoce a la mayoría y los considera buenas personas.
Con el monto solicitado de 1800 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de 1 maquina de coser que sirve para estampar broches y botones valorizada en 250 nuevos soles y con el saldo tiene planeado comprar materiales de costura como telas, hilos, y demás.
texts.en:
Luz, 30, is a cheerful woman who wants to improve; she’s also nice and kind.  She’s married to Gilder who is a laborer and the father of her only son, Alex, 11, who she wants to provide a better quality of life for.  She lives with her husband and son comfortably in their own house.  

Luz’s activity is sewing, an occupation she learned taking courses at an occupational education center in another city to then buy a sewing machine with her savings and since then has had a workshop at home where she takes care of customers who seek her out because of her good finishing touches thereby earning their acceptance; they recommend her to other persons who then become regular customers.  She started the business more than four months ago and she works by herself.

She considers her activity to be profitable because the profits she earns are greater than in her previous business which was selling vegetables.  She likes sewing as an occupation because of the work it generates that helped her support her spouse with household expenses and with her son’s education costs; they are her greatest motivation to make progress.  But she also comments that it is a bit uncomfortable due to the physical fatigue  caused by sitting in the same position which causes backaches.  However, this doesn’t discourage her and she continues working and putting in her best effort.  She plans to expand the business buying more sewing machines so that her work can have better finishing touches.  

This will be loan #3 from MFP.  She feels grateful for the financial help she’s been getting and wants to continue with this support so she commits to make her installment payments like she’s done with previous loans.  She comments, too, that she’s comfortable with her communal bank group because she knows most of them and considers them to be good people.

She will use the requested 1800 new soles to buy a sewing machine that attaches clasps and buttons and has a value of 250 new soles and will use the remainder to buy sewing supplies like fabric, thread and the rest.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, fabric and thread.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Tigran

texts.en: Tigran is a 37-year-old entrepreneur from Yerevan, and he lives with his wife and two children. Tigran owns a small factory where he makes furniture, which he started five years ago. Tigran has kept the growth of his business stable and now has enough loyal clients to keep his orders consistent. Tigran needs financial investments to improve his furniture-making process and make higher quality furniture. This loan will help him to purchase a necessary machine, which will help Tigran to complete his customer's orders and meet their demands.

loans.use: to buy a machine to make furniture.

loans.name: Kubanych

texts.ru:
Кубаныч 64 года, вдова. Кубаныч на протяжении 20 лет занимается полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с покупки дойной коровы. Благодаря упорному труду Кубаныч в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  4 дойные  коровы,  4 овцы, 1 лошадь и 1 бычок, что позволяет иметь прибыль около 6,000 сом (KGS) в месяц  от продажи молочных продуктов. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кубаныч обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойных коров, что позволит ей увеличить надои.  Доходы от кредита Кубаныч планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en: Kubanych is 64 years old and a widow.  She has been involved in farming and animal husbandry for 20 years, having started this business with a purchase of a dairy cow.  Thanks to Kubanych's hard work, today her business contains four dairy cows, four sheep, one horse and one bull, and yields a profit of about 6,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk products.  In order to further develop her business, Kubanych requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy dairy cows and increase milk volumes.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a further increase of domestic livestock.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Adilia

texts.es:
Adilia, de 57 años de edad es una mujer trabajadora y con muchos deseos de superación, además de ser amable y cordial.  Es conviviente con Antonio quien se dedica a la extracción de madera y es padre de sus 9 hijos, 2 de ellos fallecieron al nacer y los demás ya son independientes.  Vive en compañía de su pareja y recibe la visita constante de sus hijas quienes la apoyan y  quieren mucho, viviendo en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Adilia es la venta de bebidas gasificadas para eso cuenta con un refrigeradora y un pequeño local en su casa, además de acondicionar el ambiente con música selecta y agradable al gusto de sus clientes, donde los atiende de manera amable y cordial. Considera bastante rentable por la demanda que tiene éste  producto por lo caluroso de la zona y las buenas ganancias que le deja. Tiene más de 6 meses en éste trabajo. Le gustan su oficio ya que le permiten estar ocupada  y tener un ingreso económico con el cual pueda solventar sus gastos personales. Además viendo los buenos resultados que está teniendo,  pues tiene planes de mejorar e implementar su negocio. Este será el préstamo número 2 con la institución MFP, se siente contenta por contar con una línea de crédito para avanzar con su negocio. Además comenta sentirse a gusto con su grupo solidario ya que conoce a sus miembros y los considera ser personas amables y responsables.
Con el monto solicitado de 1200 nuevos soles, los invertirá en compra de bebidas gasificadas de diversas marcas y presentaciones, por cajas a precio por mayor; y también un amplificador de sonido valorizado en 300 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Adilia, 57, is a hardworking woman with a strong wish to get ahead; she’s also nice and kind.  She lives with Antonio who works extracting wood and is the father of their nine children.  Two of them died at birth and the rest are now independent.  She lives with her spouse and is constantly visited by her daughters who support her and love her very much; she lives in her own house.

Adilia sells carbonated soft-drinks.  To do so she has a refrigerator and a small locale at home.  She also plays select, pleasant music that pleases her customers in the environment where she provides gracious, kind service.  She considers it to be quite profitable because this product is in high demand due to the hot weather in the zone and it yields good profits.  She’s been in this business more than six months.  She likes her occupation because it keeps her busy and she has a source of income that allows her to cover her personal expenses.  

Seeing the good results she’s getting, she plans to improve and equip the business.  This will be loan #2 with MFP and she feels happy to have this line of credit to make progress with her business.  She also comments that she feels comfortable with her communal bank group because she knows the members and considers them to be kind, responsible people.

She will use the requested 1200 new soles to buy carbonated soft-drinks in assorted brands and presentations by the case at wholesale price and also a sound amplification system valued at 300 new soles.

loans.use: to buy assorted carbonated soft-drinks and a speaker.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur is a young entrepreneur from Yerevan. He lives with his mother, who is a housewife, and his father, who's a driver. Artur rents a booth in the city market, where he trades in women's bags. Artur always offers a large variety of bags, so his booth is very popular among clients.

Artur has applied for this loan to add new inventory for the new spring-summer season. Artur will keep the growth of his business stable and expand it further in the future.

loans.use: to buy bags for sale.

loans.name: Raymond

texts.en: Raymond has successfully repaid his previous loan, and the business is doing well. This will be his second loan from KADET LTD, and he plans to use the entire loan to purchase more shoes for sale. With the profits, he wants to educate himself on business management and reinvest in his business. In the future, he wants to open a business selling ladies’ clothing.

loans.use: to  buy more shoes for sale.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 62 years old, single, and has one child. She has a catering business and she also rents houses in South C Estate Nairobi. She  has been in the catering business for 27 years and earns a monthly income of 47,000 KES. 

Jane is requesting her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to purchase an oven and finish work on her rental houses.  She wants to put the profits back into the business. In the future, she wants to invest more in her rental business.

loans.use: to purchase an oven and finish work on rental houses.

loans.name: Ramon

texts.es:
Ramón, de 47 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y empeñoso, además  de ser amable y religioso.  esta casado con Yolanda quien se dedica al comercio y madre de sus 5 hijas Silvia de 25, Katy de 23, Saly de 19, Carmi de 16 y Brenda de 12 años de edad a quienes quiere mucho. Vive en compañía de su esposa e hijas, habitando su propia casa. Las actividades que realiza Ramón  son la elaboración y venta de bocaditos regionales como suspiros, turcas, ñutos, rosquillas y otros, para eso cuenta con un horno artesanal en su casa, logrando vender en cantidad entregando pedidos a las bodegas de las zonas.  
Viene funcionando desde hace 15 años, iniciándose con un capital propio  luego fue creciendo con préstamos de MFP, ofreciendo y vendiendo muy amablemente a sus clientes con el apoyo de su esposa en la elaboración y comercialización de sus productos.
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja y el lograr vender todo el producto que prepara.
Le gusta su actividad ya que lo mantiene  ocupado, le permite tener un oficio que aprendió de su difunta suegra, gracias a ello le genera un ingreso económico para solventara sus gastos propios y la educación de sus hijas a quienes quiere mucho, además de estar en casa mas tiempo. Por tanto  y viendo los buenos resultados que está teniendo, tiene planes de ampliar su negocio, e incursionar en otros negocios como abrir una bodega de abarrotes en su casa, donde atenderían su esposa e hijas, así estaría teniendo más ingresos. Este será el préstamo número 3 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida con el apoyo financiero que viene recibiendo para avanzar con su negocio. Por tal motivo se compromete a ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas como en los créditos anteriores.
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de los ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de sus bocaditos como harinas, mantecas, mantequilla, aceites y otros, buscando precios más cómodos por sus compras al contando, así tendrá un stock disponible para preparar sus productos.
texts.en:
Ramón, 47, is a hardworking, enterprising man besides being kind and religious.  He’s married to Yolanda who is a merchant and the mother of their five daughters: Silvia, 25, Katy, 23, Saly, 19, Carmi, 16 and Brenda, 12, who he loves very much.  He lives with his wife and daughters in his own house.  

Ramón’s activity is baking traditional snacks like suspiros, turcas, ñutos, rosquillas and others.  To do so he has an artisanal oven at home and he manages to sell in quantity filling orders for stores in the area.  He’s been in business for 15 years having started with capital of his own but growing thanks to MFP loans.  He kindly offers and sells to his customers with help from his wife who helps him manufacture and sell his products.  He considers his business to be quite profitable because of the good profits it yields and because he manages to sell out all the product he manufactures.   He likes his activity because it keeps him busy.  He has an occupation that he learned thanks to his late mother-in-law and thanks to it he generates income to cover his personal expenses and the educational expenses of his daughters who he loves very much; in addition he gets to spend more time at home.

Because of all this and seeing the good results he’s getting, he plans to expand the business and go into other areas like opening a grocery store at home that his wife and daughters will tend to.  This way he will be earning more income.

This will be loan #3 with MFP and he feels grateful for the financial support he’s been getting in order to make progress with his business.  He therefore commits to be responsible with his installment payments like he’s been in previous loans.

He will use the requested 1500 new soles to buy the ingredients needed to prepare his snacks like flour, shortening, butter, oil and others looking for the best prices available for paying cash so that he can have stock on hand to prepare his products.

loans.use: to buy flour, shortening, butter and oil.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip is 24 years old and single. He is a farmer and has been in this business for the past nine years. He earns a monthly profit of 1,500 KES from his business.

This is his first loan from KADET LTD. He was introduced to KADET by a staff member. He will use the loan to purchase seedlings and fertilizers for use on his farm.

He hopes to boost his farming and improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies.

loans.name: Ebla

texts.en:
Ebla is 42 years old; she is a married lady with three children between 13 and 6 years old.

Ebla has operated her clothing business in Nakuru town for the last nine years. She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our existing clients, and this will be her first loan. She plans to use the loan amount to buy more clothes for sale.

In the future, Ebla hopes to expand her business and open a boutique.

loans.use: to buy clothes for sale.

loans.name: Agatha

texts.en:
Agatha is a 37-year-old married woman. She and her husband Reuben are blessed with two children aged seven and three years. She is a poultry farmer. She has been in this business for two years and earns a monthly income of 10,000 KES. 

This is Agatha's second loan. She has requested this loan of 40,000 KES to purchase poultry feed and additional chicks for sale. She will use the profits to pay back her loan. Her dream is to have a large poultry farm.

loans.use: to purchase poultry feed and chicks for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase furniture for his home.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 38 years old and has been a farmer in Ndunyu Njeru for the last seven years now. He and his wife Lucy have two children. He plans to use this loan to buy potato seedlings and fertilizer. 

In the future, Francis hopes to start zero grazing and even add more dairy cattle, as well as start wheat farming on a large scale.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.name: Froylan

texts.es: Froylan es  un  joven  muy trabajador, su  mayor  sueño  es  acondicionar  su  vivienda, es  por  ello  que se acerco  con   nosotros ya  que  solicita  de  nuestro  apoyo para  realizar  la construcción de  la barda  en  su   vivienda, el  esta  muy contento de  habernos  encontrado  y  de que  le  brindemos  la  oportunidad de  realizar  su  proyecto, ve  en  el crédito  la  posibilidad  de  ofrecer  a su  familia  una mayor  seguridad  y  así  cuando  salga  a trabajar  lo hará  de  una manera  mas  tranquila.
texts.en: Froylan is a very hardworking young man.  His greatest dream is to upgrade his house and this is why he approached us to request our support to build a wall at home.  He is very happy to have found us and that we will provide him the opportunity to carry out his project.  He sees in the loan the possibility of offering his family greater security so that when he goes out to work he will do so with more peace of mind.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
Doris, de 52 años, es una mujer emprendedora y que no le tiene miedo a los retos, está casada y tiene cuatro hijos a quienes crió y educó hasta convertirlos en personas de bien. Vive en su casa propia a lado de su esposo y una nieta de 15 años a quien cría y educa ya que sus padres están fuera de la ciudad trabajando. Doris, tiene como trabajo la venta de bebidas al por menor, el carro repartidor de una empresa cervecera grande de la ciudad se encarga de llevar directamente de la planta hasta su local que está en su propia casa, ella se encarga de venderlos en su local que es un bar en donde recepciona a sus clientes a ritmo de buena música y un ambiente acogedor en donde prima la atención directa al publico. Además ella como es una mujer que tiene buena visión de negocio vio necesario implementar en su cuadra la venta de balones de gas con todas las medidas de seguridad que exigen la autoridades y tiene un negocio complementario de venta de golosinas. Lleva trabajando con la venta de bebidas hace 14 años y sus negocios complementarios los fue poniendo en el transcurso de ese tiempo.
Le gusta lo que hace, pues brinda servicio de calidad a sus clientes con mucha responsabilidad y medidas de seguridad complementarias, además con todo lo que ofrece puede tener buenas ventas y con esto mejorar los ingresos a la economía de su hogar, desea seguir trabajando y más adelante agrandar su negocio con un minimarket. Este será el crédito número 3 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración par continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado ella se compromete a seguir siendo una socia puntual y cumplida como en los créditos anteriores que tuvo, además desea seguir trabajando con los socios de su banco comunal ya que todos son muy amables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará mas bebidas y golosinas para continuar con su venta en su negocio ya que desea ampliar las opciones a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Doris, 52, is an enterprising woman who is not afraid of challenges.  She’s married and has four children that she raised and educated turning them into upstanding persons.  She lives in her own house with her husband and a 15 year old granddaughter who she raises and educates because her parents are away from the city working.

Doris' work is selling beverages at retail.  The delivery truck from a large brewery in the city delivers directly from the plant to her locale that’s located at home and she then sells them in her locale which is a pub where she receives her customers with the beat of good music and a welcoming atmosphere where service direct to the public is the norm.

In addition, because she’s a woman with good business sense, she saw the need to set up on her block a service selling tanks of propane with all the safety measures the authorities require and she also has a business selling snacks.

She’s been selling beverages for 14 years and the has been adding the complementary businesses over time.  She likes what she does because she provides quality service with responsibility and complementary safety measures.  In addition, with everything she offers she’s able to make good sales thus improving her home’s economy.  She wants to continue working and later on expand her business with a minimart.

This will be loan #3 with MFP so she’s hoping for your collaboration so that she can continue toward her objectives.  On the other hand, she commits to continue being a punctual, responsible member like she was with her previous loans. She wants to continue to work with her fellow communal bank members because they are very kind and mutually supportive.

She will use the requested 1000 new soles to buy more beverages and snacks to continue with her sales business since she wants to expand options for her customers.

loans.use: to buy assorted beverages and snacks.

loans.name: Grégoire

texts.fr:
Grégoire est un homme âgé de 43 ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il a 04 enfants, tous scolarisés. Le premier a 17 ans et le dernier a 05 ans.  
Grégoire travaille comme revendeur  d’huile à moteur depuis 1999. Il est aidé par 01 personne et étale sa marchandise au bord de la route.
Grégoire a requis son second crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter d’huile à moteur. Il veut scolariser ses enfants avec le profit réalisé. 
Dans les prochaines années, Grégoire voudrait accroitre son activité et assurer la santé et l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Grégoire is a 43-year-old man who is married to a retailer. He has four children, all in school. The oldest child is 17 years old, and the youngest is 5. 

Grégoire has been working as a seller of motor oil since 1999. He is helped by one person and displays his merchandise at the side of the road. 

Grégoire has requested his second loan from WAGES to buy some motor oil. He wants to provide schooling to his children with the profits made. In the next few years, he would like to increase his business and to ensure his children's health care and education are covered.

loans.use: to buy motor oil

loans.name: Jacoba

texts.es:
Jacoba, de 55 años de edad, es una mujer alegre y con deseos de superación, así como también es amable y cordial. Está casada con Jaime quien es empleado y padre de su única hija Milagros de 21 años de edad.  Vive en compañía de su esposo y su hija, instalados cómodamente en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Jacoba es la costura, oficio que aprendió estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional, para luego comprar una maquina de coser con sus ahorros, la cual instaló en su propia casa, desde donde atiende a sus clientes quienes la buscan por sus buenos acabados, logrando ganar  su aceptación y así una regular clientela.
Lleva realizando éste oficio hace más de  16 años que lleva en éste negocio, realizándolo ella sola.
Considera a su negocio rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja.
Le gusta su negocio ya que le gusta la costura, que le valió para apoyar a su pareja a solventar los gastos de su hogar y la educación de su hija, quien es  su mayor motivación para progresar. Pero comenta le incomoda un poco el cansancio físico por estar sentada en una misma postura que le ocasiona dolores de espalda, pero eso no la desanima y continua trabajando y esforzándose. Por tanto tiene planes de ampliar su negocio y comprar más maquinas de coser y dar trabaja a otras personas. Este será el préstamo número 03 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida con la ayuda financiera que viene recibiendo y desea continuar con este apoyo, por tanto se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en créditos anteriores.
Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra  materiales de costura como telas, hilos, y demás. Además de realizar arreglos en el piso de su  casa para su comodidad en la instalación de sus maquinas de coser y atención a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Jacoba, 55, is a happy woman with a desire for self-improvement.  She is also friendly and cordial.  She is married to Jaime, who works and is the father of her only child, Milagros, 21.  She lives with her husband and daughter comfortably in her own house.

The work she does is sewing, a job she learned studying in a center for occupational education.  Later she bought a sewing machine with her savings and set it up in her own house, from where she serves her customers, who search her out for her good work.  She manages to earn their acceptance and so a regular clientele.

She has been doing this work for more than 16 years, and she does it alone.  She considers her business worthwhile because it gives her good profits.

She likes her business because she likes sewing and it was worth it to her to help her husband pay for the household expenses and the education of her daughter, her greatest motivation for getting ahead.  But she comments that, because she has to be seated in the same posture, which gives her backaches, the physical fatigue inconveniences her a little.  This does not discourage her, though, and she continues to work and make the effort.  For this reason, she has plans to expand her business, buy more sewing machines, and give work to other people.

This will be her third loan with the MFP institution.  She is grateful for the financial help she is receiving and wants to continue with this support, so she promises to make the payments on time as with her previous loans.

With the requested amount of 2000 nuevos soles (PEN), she will invest in buying sewing materials such as fabric, thread, and others.  In addition, she will make repairs to the floor of her house for her convenience in installing her sewing machines and serving her customers.

loans.use: to repair the floor of her sewing workshop to better serve her customers.

loans.name: Yeni Carolina

texts.es:
Yeni tiene 25 años de edad, es soltera, y vive con sus padres en la ciudad de San Pedro Sula Cortes.
Yeni es una mujer muy emprendedora ella es una estudiante pero hace 1 año estableció un negocio de venta de ropa. Lo inicio con la necesidad de no contar con una fuente de empleo para solventar los gastos de su familia y de sus estudios. Ella ofrece variedad de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños como (blusas, vestidos, camisas, fajas y carteras. Ella trabaja en su negocio 8 horas diarias.
Es su primer préstamo con ODEF de 20,000 lempiras para surtir su negocio en comprar mercadería como Ropa para damas y caballeros. Y así ofrecer variedad de prendas de vestir a sus clientes. 
Su meta es graduarse y ayudar económicamente a sus padres, y que su negocio pueda crecer mas para dar precios accesibles a los clientes.
texts.en:
Yeni, 25, is single living with her parents in the city of San Pedro Sula, Cortes.  

Yeni is a very enterprising woman.  She’s a student but a year ago opened a clothing sales business.  She started it because she did not have a source of income to cover her family and her educational expenses.  She sells a variety of clothes for women, men and children (blouses, dresses, shirts, belts and purses).  She works 8 hours a day in her business.

This is her first ODEF loan for 20,000 Lempiras to stock her business.  She will buy clothes for women and men to have a wide variety of clothes available for he customers.  Her goal is to graduate and to help her parents economically and that her business is able to grow more so that she can offer affordable prices to her customers.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Ermires

texts.es:
Ermires es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador, y esta cualidad le ha permitido salir adelante a pesar de las adversidades que le ha presentado la vida. Ermires se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos de 3 y 5 años de edad, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena calidad de vida y el acceso a una mejor educación. Ermires, gracias a un amigo que le enseñó la actividad desde hace un tiempo, aprendió a trabajar la ebanistería, y desde entonces se ha dedicado a esta actividad con la cual genera los ingresos que requiere para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Ermires tiene la dificultad de que a menudo genera muy bajos ingresos para su hogar y sus hijos y su esposa requieren de un poco más aporte económico, por lo que busca constantemente la manera de ofrecer a sus clientes un mejor servicio para poder seguir creciendo y tener más pedidos de sus clientes. Con la finalidad de ofrecer un mejor servicio para sus clientes, Ermires busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de herramientas de trabajo como taladros y hacerle mantenimiento a las que tiene.

Ermires espera que de esta manera siga generando los ingresos que requiere en su hogar para poder ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas. Ermires tiene el sueño de tener su propia casa y por esto trabaja fuertemente en su negocio todos los días para cumplirlo y ofrecerle a sus hijos una estabilidad en un hogar propio.
texts.en:
Ermires is a person who has always been characterized by being very hardworking.  This quality has made it possible for him to get ahead despite adversities life has presented him.

Ermires is married and has two children who are 3 and 5 years old who he’s always wanted to provide a good quality of life and a better education for.

Thanks to a friend who taught him some time ago, Ermires learned cabinet making and since then has worked in this activity earning income needed to support his home.

His difficulty is that the income he generates for his home, children and wife is often very low so he needs to earn a bit more.  Because of this he’s constantly looking for ways to offer his customers better service so that he can continue to grow and have more customer orders.

With the aim of offering better customer service, Ermires is looking for a loan that will make it possible for him to buy work tools like drills and to service the tools he already has.

Ermires hopes that this way he will continue to generate the income his home needs to offer his children a better quality of life and better economic opportunities.  

Ermires dreams with having a house of his own and this is why he works hard at his business every day to reach it and offer his children stability in a home of their own.

loans.use: to buy new work tools and to service the ones he already has.

loans.name: Horacio

texts.es:
El señor Horacio solicita el préstamo para poder invertir en comprar más aparatos eléctricos como es aires acondicionados para la venta ya que sus clientes le están solicitando estos para la temporada de verano. 
Don Horacio y su esposa la señora Claudia son personas trabajadoras y responsables, las cuales se dedican al comercio el en la venta de aparatos eléctricos y la señora Claudia en la venta de elotes preparados por diferentes partes de la ciudad de Nuevo Laredo. 
Desean mejorar sus ingresos con la inversión que le realizaran a su negocio. 
-
texts.en:
Horacio is asking for the loan to buy more electric appliances like air conditioners to sell because his customers are requesting them for the summer.  Horacio and his wife, Claudia, are hardworking, responsible people who are merchants.  He sells air conditioners and Claudia sells prepared corn on the cob [dressed with mayonnaise, cheese, chili, lemon juice, etc.] in various parts of the city of Nuevo Laredo.  They want to improve their income with the investment they’ll make in the business.

-

loans.use: to buy more air conditioning equipment.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María, de 40 años, es una mujer buena, amable y emprendedora, es conviviente con Milton de 40 años y con quien tiene un hijo llamado Cristian de 21 años a quien brindan educación y su deseo es verlo profesional, ella vive junto a su familia en su casa propia en donde trabaja mucho pues desea tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de María consiste en la realización de paneles, gigantografías y afiches publicitarios, tiene clientes que siempre la buscan y desean que con su imaginación y creatividad les haga alguna publicidad o promoción de algún producto nuevo, durante los últimos tiempo ha tenido muy buenos clientes los cuales al pasar del tiempo lo ha logrado mantener fieles debido al buen trato y excelente trabajo que brinda. Lleva realizando su trabajo por más de 12 años, al principio le fue muy complicado poder aprender el negocio, pero con el tiempo, con los tropiezos y experiencias aprendió a como maximizar ganancias y tener clientes siempre satisfechos. Le gusta su trabajo, pues siempre está en constante movimiento y eso le hace sentir siempre joven y muy útil en su negocio. Aun que le va bien por sus buenas ventas, hace algunas semana sufrió algunos problemas debido a que no tenia suficiente capital para cumplir con un pedido que tiene de un muy buen cliente, esto no le permitió cerrar un buen trato, pero que felizmente tiene nuevamente la oportunidad de poder hacerlo en el transcurso de este mes, es por eso que desea aumentar su capital y así lograr cumplir con todos sus pedidos. Este será el segundo crédito con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero ya que así se sentirá mas tranquila al momento de realizar la proyección del mes su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete a seguir siendo un cliente puntual como en los anteriores créditos que tuvo. 
Con el monto solicitado 4000 soles, comprará materiales, equipos y accesorios para implementar su taller, ya que desea cumplir con todos los pedidos que tiene y poder cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
María, 40, is a good, kind and enterprising woman.  She lives with Milton, 40, and they have a 21 year old son called Cristian who they provide education for and her wish is to see him become a professional.  She lives with her family in a house of her own where she works hard because she wants to have a better quality of life.

María’s work consists in making publicity panels, giant banners and posters.  She has customers that always seek her out and want her to use her imagination and creativity to create publicity or to promote some new product.  She has recently acquired very good customers who as time has passed have become regular due to the good service and excellent work she does.  She’s been in business 12 years.  At the beginning it was pretty complicated to learn the business but in time through trial and error she learned how to maximize profits and to keep her customers satisfied always.  She enjoys her work because she’s in constant movement and this makes he feel always young and very useful in her business. 

Although she does well because of her good sales, a few weeks ago she suffered some problems because she did not have enough capital to fulfill an order she got from a very good customer and she was unable to close a good deal.  Happily, she once again has the opportunity to be able to do so this month and this is why she wants to increase capital so that she can fill all her orders.

This will be her second MFP loan.  She’s very happy to know that she will have financial support because she’ll have peace of mind when it comes to make her monthly work projection.  On the other hand, she commits to continue being a punctual client like she’s been with the previous loans she’s had.

She will use the requested 4000 new soles to buy materials, equipment and accessories to set up the workshop because she wants o fill all the orders she has and be able to respond to customer demand.

loans.use: to buy printing supplies.

loans.name: Jazgul

texts.ru: Жазгуль 31 год, замужем, воспитывает двух дочерей 8 и 9  лет.  В 2002 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи,  Жазгуль начала свой бизнес в животноводстве. Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  Жазгуль сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  в 15,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день  в хозяйстве Жазгуль насчитывается 6 дойных коров и 4 бычка. В целях увеличения поголовья скота, Жазгуль  обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS).  Доходы от кредита Жазгуль планирует вложить в дальнейшее  развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Jazgul is 31 years old, married and raising two daughters, who are eight and nine years old.  In search of a source of income for her family, Jazgul started her own business in animal husbandry in 2002.  Thanks to her persistence and hard work, Jazgul was able to grow her business to have a monthly income of 15,000 som (KGS).  Today, her business contains six dairy cows and two bulls.  In order to increase livestock headcount, Jazgul requested a loan in the amount of 70,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a further development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: Rosario, de 53 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy empeñosa, es conviviente con Segundo de 49 años con quien tiene ocho hijos, de los cuales siete son mayores e independientes, y solo uno de 8 años vive a su lado y depende de ella, trabaja mucho para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Durante lagos años, Rosario trabajó en la compra y venta de productos regionales en los diversos caseríos de la región, mientras hacia eso, sufría mucho, pues tenia que estar lejos de sus hijos durante mucho tiempo, además de no poder verlos crecer como ella quería, es por eso que una vez que sus siete hijos se volvieron independientes, decidió cambiar el lugar de su trabajo y empezar a vender productos en su casa y ver así crecer a su menor hijo, además de estar mas tranquila y poder así pasar mas tiempo a lado de su familia. Durante los dos últimos años que está en trabajando en su casa, ha disfrutado cada minuto a lado de su familia y eso el algo que ella valora mucho. Le gusta mucho su trabajo, ya que está siempre en constante movimiento y puede tener buenas ventas y con eso logra buenos ingresos. Ahora está en búsqueda de un socio para inverir en su negocio y hacerlo crecer empezando a vender mayor cantidad. Este será el cuarto préstamo con MFP, está muy contenta por que le brindaran un respaldo financiero y así podrá aumentar su capital de trabajo, sabe que tendrá que ser muy responsable y sobre todo muy puntual. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará productos regionales para empezar a vender en su casa, entre las cosas que pondrá a la venta serán, plátanos, yuca, maíz, pescado seco, carne y mas productos que son de mucha salida en la cuadra de su casa.
texts.en:
Rosario, 53, is a good, kind and very enterprising woman.  She lives with Segundo, 49, with whom she has 8 children seven of which are independent adults; only an 8 year old still lives with and depends on her.  She works hard to provide a better quality of life for her family.

For long years Rosario worked buying and selling regional products in the various settlements in the region.  While she did that she suffered much because she had to be away from her children for long periods of time; she was unable to watch them grow up as she would have liked.  Because of that, once her seven children became independent she decided to change her workplace and start selling products at home to enjoy watching her youngest child grow up as well as to have more peace of mind and to be able to spend more time alongside her family.

During these last two years that she’s been working at home she’s enjoyed every minute alongside her family and this is something she values highly.  She enjoys her work very much because she’s in constant movement and she can attain good sales which produce good income.  She’s now looking for a partner to invest in her business so that it will grow starting to sell larger amounts.

This will be her fourth MFP loan.  She is very happy that she’ll have financial backing to increase working capital.  She knows that she will have to be very responsible and above all very punctual.

She will use the requested 1500 new soles to buy regional products to start to sell them at home.  Among the things she will put up for sale are bananas, manioc, corn, dried fish, meat and other products that sell well on her block.

loans.use: to buy bananas, manioc, corn, dried fish and meat.

loans.name: Dickson

texts.en:
Dickson is 32 years old, married, and has four children. He supports a family of 10 people.  He is a farmer, which he has been doing for two years, and generates a monthly income of  15,000 KES.

Dickson is requesting a loan, which he will use to purchase a water pump for his horticulture.  His anticipated profits will be used to pay school fees for his children and to supplement the basic needs of his family. He hopes to expand the acreage of his horticultural land to large scale production.

loans.use: to purchase farming equipment.

loans.name: Tura

texts.ru: Тура женат и любящий отец двоих детей. Более 20 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Данным видом бизнеса он знаком с детства, и имеет богатый опыт. В бизнесе помогают его семья. Кроме земледелия Тура занимается купле- продажей скота. Тура хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы улучшить жилищные условия. Тура хотел бы получить займ в размере 4000 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений для выращивания сельхозкультур и покупки скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и понимание.
texts.en: Tura is married and a loving father of two children.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over 20 years.  He has been familiar with this type of business since childhood and has a rich experience in it.  His family helps him with the business.  Besides farming, Tura is involved in buying and selling livestock.  Tura wants to expand his business in order to improve his living conditions.  Tura wants to obtain a loan in the amount of 4000 Somoni to purchase mineral fertilizers in order to grow agricultural crops and to buy livestock.  He relies on your help and understanding.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and cattle

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Sin mucho capital pero con muchas ganas de salir adelante, Francisco ha sacado su negocio de preparación y venta de chorizos adelante. Hace aproximadamente 17 años comenzó a desempeñar la actividad, y en un principio la preparación de sus productos era de manera muy empírica, pero gracias a la buena calidad de los mismos y a la buena atención que ofrece a sus clientes, el negocio tuvo una gran demanda que le permitió preparar los productos de una manera más tecnificada. Tomando cursos sobre manipulación de alimentos fue aprendiendo a desempeñar la actividad con mejores prácticas, y gracias a esto su negocio actualmente tiene muy buena clientela que le garantiza a Francisco y a su familia una gran calidad de vida. Debido a unas humedades que presenta en el local donde prepara sus productos, Francisco busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de realizar reparaciones locativas en el humedal que le perjudica las operaciones normales de su negocio.

Francisco espera que de esta manera su negocio siga creciendo y siga ofreciendo una buena atención a sus clientes, para garantizar unos ingresos con los cuales pueda seguir mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Francisco sueña con tener un gran negocio con el que pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Although he does not have much capital, Francisco is very determined to make his sausage production and sales business prosper.  Approximately 17 years ago he began the business.  At first his products were very experimental, but because of their quality and the good customer service, business grew significantly which allowed him to make his products more technically.  By taking food handling courses he learned to apply better techniques, thanks to which the business currently has a good number of customers, guaranteeing Francisco and his family a quality lifestlye.  Due to humidity where he prepares the products, Francisco is requesting a loan to repair the damage that affects normal business operation.

Francisco wants his business to continue growing and to be able to provide good customers service, to ensure an income that will improve his family's lifestyle.  Francisco's goal is to have a large business some day and generate employment for people who need it most.

loans.use: To repair damages caused by humidity, which affect business operations.

loans.name: Moussiliatou Balbine

texts.fr: Moussiliatou Balbine,âgée de 27 ans, est célibataire sans enfant. Elle commercialise des produits cosmétiques. Elle a 05 ans d'expérience et s'approvisionne dans un marché du pays.Dans le but d'agrandir son commerce elle a eu recours au financement de Finadev. En effet ce concours lui permettra de mieux satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle et d'améliorer sa condition de vie.
texts.en:
Moussiliatou Balbine is 27 years old, single with no children. She retails cosmetics.

She has five years experience and gets her supplies from one of the country's markets. To expand her business she is seeking a financial loan from Finadev. Indeed, their support will help her to better meet customer demands and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: one box of ointments, one box of soap, one box of perfumes

loans.name: Shavkat

texts.ru: Шавкат трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Более 11 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. А также имеет свое зарегистрированное дехканское хозяйство «Хочи Сафарако» в размере 1, 3 гектаров земли и на этом участке выращивает более 200 шт. плодовых деревьев. Также он перерабатывает абрикос, выращенные в своем саду. На данный момент у него проблемы с водой и он хочет купить насос и установить для орошения земли. С  этой целью Шавкат запрашивает займ в размере 3000$ США. Шавкат надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Shavkat is a hardworking and goal-oriented person.  He has been involved in buying and selling livestock for over 11 years.  He also has his own registered dekhan farm business, called "Hochi Safarako", consisting of 1.3 hectares of land, where he grows over 200 fruit trees.  Shavkat also processes apricots, grown in his orchard.  At the present time, he is experiencing issues with water and wants to buy a pump and install it to irrigate the ground.  To achieve this goal, Shavkat is requesting a loan in the amount of $3000.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy a pump for irrigation

loans.name: Gerardo De Jesus

texts.es:
Grandes dificultades en la vida se le han presentado en la vida a Gerardo, sin embargo, sus ganas de salir adelante siempre le han permitido superarlas y continuar progresando junto a su familia. Desde muy pequeño inició una venta de snack con lo que se generaba su propio sustento y así aligeraba la carga económica de sus padres, que siempre tuvieron dificultades económicas.
